skills.title: React js
skills.description: I possess a good understanding of React.js with a solid 1.2 years of hands-on experience, demonstrating proficiency and expertise in this technology.

skills.title: javaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is my core expertise, enabling me to craft dynamic and visually captivating websites with a deep understanding and proficiency in this language.

skills.title: HTML5 & CSS3
skills.description: With 1.5 years of HTML and CSS experience, I expertly translate Figma and Adobe XD designs, ensuring precise implementation tailored to client needs.

skills.title: Library
skills.description: I am proficient in various libraries such as NPM Package, Bootstrap, Tailwind, Material UI, TypeScript, SCSS & SASS, enriching React.js projects

portfolio.title: Speech to Text App
portfolio.description: i Have made this Amazing tool which convert your speeking word's to Text. Where User can click the button to start Recording and Stop recording and user can Copy to Clipboard and paste at anywhere Using React js, Node Package's, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Material UI

portfolio.title: Movie Review (IMDb clone)
portfolio.description: i have made Movie review website using React, real time API. Where user can get movie review, his offical IMDb rating, moview photo's and description. I have provided 3 category's of movies, Popular, Top Rated, Upcoming... in this project i have learnd how to use API, Axios, Routing in Live Project's

portfolio.title: My Family Business Website
portfolio.description: I developed a website for my family's advertising agency, which promotes through social media and offline posters. This project provided significant learning opportunities during my developmental phase, contributing to my growth in web development understanding.
